fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?

loopRoutine.note: Deal each player a hand of cards

resetTricksRoutine.note: Set each player's tricks won to 0

clickRoutine.header: Add this many points to your score:

clickRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 1 of 2: only add value if it is an integer

thenRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 2 of 2: only add value if it is a three-digit number

fields.text: You're about to start a new round. Are you sure?

info.name: White Elephant
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

All card icons are from https://game-icons.net and under CC BY 3.0.

The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license:
https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/hand-drawn-christmas-fireplace-scene_11200697.htm
info.description: Grab your favorite gifts from the table, and give your friends the gifts you don't want!

label-guide-3p.text:
Cards Used:		0-10
Starting Hand:	13 cards
Magic Number:	4 tricks

label-guide-4p.text:
Cards Used:		0-12
Starting Hand:	13 cards
Magic Number:	3 tricks

label-guide-5p.text:
Cards Used:		0-15
Starting Hand:	14 cards
Magic Number:	3 tricks

fields.text: You're about to shuffle and refresh the objective. Are you sure?

clickRoutine.header: Add this many points to your score:

clickRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 1 of 2: only add value if it is an integer

thenRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 2 of 2: only add value if it is a three-digit number

label-guidetext.text:
Trios (same # in 3 suits):
  
Trio of 0's		20 pts
Trio of 1's		19 pts
Trio of 2's		18 pts
...				...
Trio of 10's		10 pts

fields.text: You're about to reveal hands of all players. Are you sure?

obj-1.caption: All remaining cards in your hand score.

obj-2.caption: All cards of one color of your choice score.

obj-3.caption: The highest-value card of each color scores.

obj-4.caption: All pairs of the same value score, regardless of color.

obj-5.caption: All pairs of the same value and same color score.

obj-8.caption: The longest consecutive run of numbers in one color scores.
